column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday May 7 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Beaumont Centre Cir area:
column4: Beaumont Centre Cir is shutdown between Snaffle Rd and Lakecrest Cir due to a ruptured gas line.

column3: Traffic Alert for Beaumont Centre Cir area:
column4: Detour via Snaffle Rd and Ft Harrods Dr.  No access to Beaumont Centre Pkwy from Harrodsburg Rd.
